title: Minivan stuck on tracks during storm hit by commuter rail in Belmont
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Local News Two people in the vehicle were sent to a local hospital with serious but non-life threatening injuries, Transit Police said.
A minivan was hit by a commuter rail train in Belmont.

title: These airlines are increasing flights between New England and the Bay Area for the Super Bowl
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Flights And one airline is having some fun with Boston-specific flight numbers.
JetBlue planes at Logan Airport Terminal C David L.
Ryan/Globe Staff Airlines are stepping up service between New England and the Bay Area in February after the New England Patriots secured a spot in Super Bowl LX on Sunday night.

title: Verizon offers refunds as Fox blackout drags on
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News Customers in Boston and Providence have been without their local Fox station for more than a month, missing key New England Patriots games.
The Verizon logo on a storefront in Boston.

Michael Dwyer / AP, File Verizon Fios says it will offer refunds to customers in the Boston, Providence, and Pittsburgh markets who have gone more than a month without key channels — including Fox’s NFL broadcasts — because of an ongoing carriage dispute with Cox Media Group.
